actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-602.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 8011, a bill to extend for 1 year the special pay provisions for physicians and dentist in the uniformed services and to reinstate the special pay provisions for optometrists and veterinarians in the uniformed services.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 8011 (Pay for medical personnel in uniformed services).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 8011, a bill to extend for 1 year the special pay provisions for physicians and dentist in the uniformed services and to reinstate the special pay provisions for optometrists and veterinarians in the uniformed services.
